Text: As mentioned on Vol. 12... got the next one straight away... even though Vol. 5 wasn't much to my liking, I'll give this one a try.
Meant to write Vol. 8 (Dark Ballads and Wicked Melodies) instead of Vol. 5 (Neofolk & Neoclassical). My bad.

I'll Just leave my thanks here, but they go for the whole collection! 
You have put together a lot of great Industrial, made some thematic compilations, tagged it all just right and generally done everything like it should be done...I wish more compilations here held the same high standard...thankyaverramuch!!!
Brilliant compilation!! You have introduced me to some great bands and rare tracks. Thanks heaps!!
I think i am in love with you...
Awesome compilation creator is awesome! Thank you for these!
Would appreciate a re-seed on this. I am an industrial DJ, and I love these collections. Thank you so much.
